value.title: Recognize specific voices with the Speaker Recognition APIs in Azure Cognitive Services
value.excerpt: This module guides you through learning about speaker recognition and how to use the Speaker Recognition APIs to identify specific people through their voices.

value.title: Deploy real-time machine learning services with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Learn how to register and deploy ML models as real-rim services with the Azure Machine Learning service.

value.title: Manage software delivery by using a release based workflow on GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn to implement a release based workflow on GitHub using project boards, branches, and releases.

value.title: Route system feedback to development teams
value.excerpt: Learn how continuous monitoring and dashboards give you insight into how customers use your software and where patterns of failure occur.

value.title: SAP HANA on Azure Compute, Network, and Storage
value.excerpt: AP HANA on Azure (Large Instances) provides virtual machines for deploying and running SAP HANA. This module explores the SAP HANA on Azure (Large Instances) solution that builds on assigned, non -shared host/server bare -metal hardware.

value.title: Scan open source components for vulnerabilities and license ratings in Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Scan open-source components for security vulnerabilities and assess their license ratings when your application builds in Azure Pipelines.

value.title: Secure Azure Active Directory users with Multi-Factor Authentication
value.excerpt: Learn how to use multi-factor authentication with Azure AD to harden your user accounts.

value.title: Introduction to securing data at rest on Azure
value.excerpt: Identify the data in your organization and store it on Azure. Store secrets securely, and use client-side encryption and Storage Service Encryption to help protect your data.

value.title: Protect your servers and VMs from brute-force and malware attacks with Azure Security Center
value.excerpt: Stop hackers from getting into your Windows and Linux servers. In this module, you’ll discover how to protect VMs and servers with Azure Security Center

value.title: Store and share files in your application with Azure Files
value.excerpt: Azure Files provides a cloud-based file share for storing and sharing files to applications. Whether it's an application hosted in Azure App Service, an Azure VM, or an on-premises app, Azure Files can store and share file access between one or more applications and systems in a secure and failure-resilient manner.

value.title: The Principles of Sustainable Software Engineering
value.excerpt: Sustainable Software Engineering is an emerging discipline at the intersection of climate science, software, hardware, electricity markets, and data center design. The Principles of Sustainable Software Engineering are a core set of competencies needed to define, build, and run sustainable software applications.

value.title: Train and package an Azure machine learning module for deployment to IoT Edge device
value.excerpt: University of Oxford

value.title: Transform data by using Azure Stream Analytics
value.excerpt: Learn how to create Azure Stream Analytics jobs to process input data, transform it with a query, and return results

value.title: Troubleshoot inbound network connectivity for Azure Load Balancer
value.excerpt: Learn how to troubleshoot inbound network connectivity for Azure Load Balancer.

value.title: Tune hyperparameters with Azure Machine Learning
value.excerpt: Choosing optimal hyperparameter values for model training can be difficult, and usually involved a great deal of trial and error. With Azure Machine Learning, you can leverage cloud-scale experiments to tune hyperparameters.

value.title: Using IAAS support with Azure for SAP workloads
value.excerpt: There are a variety of commonly used SAP-certified operating systems supported by SAP running on Azure VMs, and there are also several different methods of provisioning storage for SAP workloads in Azure. In this module, you will learn the SAP recommended support products and VM types as well as the network, database, and monitoring requirements.

value.title: Work with DataFrames columns in Azure Databricks
value.excerpt: Work with DataFrames columns in Azure Databricks

value.title: Work with mutable and partial data in Azure Cache for Redis
value.excerpt: Learn how to create transactions, manage memory, and use the cache-aside pattern with Azure Cache for Redis
